data.message_description: Bad weather - Ceiling / Visibility, runway condition (if slow ground handling due to weather use 77)
System technical issue - PLANNED POWER OUTAGE, unscheduled extension of planned works
Operational reasons - Late Airline security staff, Airline security staff come late to A/C for A/C antisabotage process or any mandatory security process
Technical delay - LATE RELEASE FROM SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE, aircraft release late from planned maintenance (if late tow use 34G)
